ComicInfo.Title: Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; Gross and Beyond Gross: the Sequel; Meek With the Parents; A Mad Look at the WWF; 6 Degrees of Separation Between Anyone and Anything Part V; “Likelihood-of-Outcome” Charts for Those Stupid Things We All Do; Specialized State Death Penalties; Rejected Playboy Playmates; Monroe and… President’s Day; Suburban Deviants and Their Really Minor Crimes; Obituaries for Video Game Characters; Mad’s Guide to Safe Scootering; The Worst Wing; One Fine Day on Main Street
ComicInfo.Summary:
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.
Comparisons of gross happenings with extra-gross happenings.
